nodes.bodyText: So strange - I checked that method to see if there were any side effects (that we wanted) to explain why we get a prefs object and then ignore it everywhere, and nothing. I love seeing dead code go away, thanks
To any other readers: Usage removed in 2da08a0, but method remained.

assert doesn't work in the android JVM so this is something we don't use in AnkiDroid
I believe the Android Studio 4.x toolchain (including gradle plugins) which actually start making assert work via the extra de-sugaring they are implementing but that's still in alpha
Either way, if we want assert behavior we Timber.e and throw RuntimeException, it's effectively the same

Thanks for the heads up
FYI: We use assert in libAnki. That might need an issue.
I was using an assert to fix code quality warnings over use of a @Nullable. Will fix.
